posts.postText:
Offender name?:i <3 jesus
Which Server?:TTT
Offender's Steam ID?:STEAM_0:1:33325796
What the Offender did?:One round as detective he killed Lenny for punching him, then claiming that it had done damage over the mic, even though it clearly did not. Then a couple of rounds later he kills Treecko, while Treecko is AFK, and says over mic that "Treecko was suspicious, I thought he was buying a knife so I killed him". We all told him that Treecko was obviously AFK and that he should slay himself. After he refused to slay himself, he also randomly shot Treecko during that round also.
Admins on?:Dum was there for when he killed Lenny, and slayed him.
Proof?:
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/jesus1a.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/jesus2a.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/jesus3a.jpg

 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/Jesus7.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/Jesus6.jpg 

That last log is proof of him not slaying himself.
Please don't include proof if an admin took care of it. However, I will shortly ban him for killing Treecko when AFK.
